name: solana-trading-bot
description: Non-custodial Solana trading bot with Telegram Mini App

scripts.dev:full: concurrently "cargo run" "cd mini-app && npm run dev"
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:frontend: cd mini-app && npm run type-check && npm run lint
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: cargo clippy --fix --allow-dirty && cd mini-app && npm run lint:fix
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format:all: npm run format && npm run format:frontend
scripts.clean: cargo clean && cd mini-app && rm -rf dist node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run setup:rust && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:git
scripts.validate: npm run check && npm run test:all && npm run lint:all
scripts.update: cargo update && cd mini-app && npm update

author: Your Name
